name: Sky Labyrinth
description:
Sky Labyrinth is 3D Puzzle Game escaping with a gravity magic.
You are an inexperienced witch. You can move objects and CHANGE THE GRAVITY..
When you encounter a dead end, you will find a new way by changing the gravity.

Key Feature:
・Spatial thinking which can not be experienced in 2D Puzzle Games.
・Uncommon puzzle gimmicks that change the gravity.
・Various puzzle gimmicks that contain movable boxes and portable cubes, etc.
・Pleasure of solving a complicated puzzle.
